persona_titles.title: visitor
persona_titles.description: End user who may be interested in travel options or the itinerary

persona_titles.title: traveler
persona_titles.description: End users who book travel for themselves and for whom autobook preferences apply to their itineraries

persona_titles.title: business-traveler
persona_titles.description: End users who book travel for business purposes with specific autobook preferences

persona_titles.title: travel-agent
persona_titles.description: Travel agent who can execute workflows on behalf of travelers, if explicitly delegated

persona_titles.title: office-manager
persona_titles.description: Office manager with delegation and workflow execution capabilities

persona_titles.title: booking-assistant
persona_titles.description: Booking assistant who can execute bookings on behalf of travelers

persona_titles.title: user-admin
persona_titles.description: Supra-level administrator with full permissions to update personas of other users
